analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xab208503ca9ffa89838dd0657108a29c500abc87.sol#379-381) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/5/0xab208503ca9ffa89838dd0657108a29c500abc87.sol#380-381)

DAOstackSale.drainTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xab208503ca9ffa89838dd0657108a29c500abc87.sol#717-719) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(wallet,_token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/5/0xab208503ca9ffa89838dd0657108a29c500abc87.sol#718-719)
